parameters.name: ConnectionString
parameters.description: The internal or public endpoint for which the server certificate needs to be created or updated.

parameters.name: DBClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeDBClusters](~~129857~~) operation to query the IDs of AnalyticDB for MySQL Data Warehouse Edition clusters within a region.

parameters.name: EnableSSL
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable SSL encryption. Valid values:

*   true
*   false
